Description.Name: Avnet MT3620 Starter Kit (SK)
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This header contains the peripheral pinout definitions for the

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_APP_STATUS_LED_YELLOW
Peripherals.Comment: Application status LED uses GPIO4.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_WLAN_STATUS_LED_YELLOW
Peripherals.Comment: WLAN status LED uses GPIO5.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_USER_LED_RED
Peripherals.Comment: User LED Red channel uses GPIO8.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_USER_LED_GREEN
Peripherals.Comment: User LED Green channel uses GPIO9.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_USER_LED_BLUE
Peripherals.Comment: User LED Blue channel uses GPIO10.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_USER_BUTTON_A
Peripherals.Comment: User BUTTON A uses GPIO12.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_USER_BUTTON_B
Peripherals.Comment: User BUTTON B uses GPIO13.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO42
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO42 is exposed on SOCKET1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO43
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO43 is exposed on SOCKET2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO16
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO16 is exposed on SOCKET1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO17
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO17 is exposed on SOCKET2 and UART/BLE Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO34
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO34 is exposed on SOCKET1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO35
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO35 is exposed on SOCKET2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO31
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO31 is exposed on SOCKET1 and SOCKET2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO33
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO33 is exposed on SOCKET1 and SOCKET2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO32
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO32 is exposed on SOCKET1 and SOCKET2.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO0
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO0 is exposed on SOCKET1.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO1
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO1 is exposed on SOCKET2 and UART/BLE Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO2
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO2 is exposed on SOCKET1, SOCKET2, and UART/BLE Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO28
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO28 is exposed on SOCKET1, SOCKET2, and UART/BLE Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO26
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO26 is exposed on SOCKET1, SOCKET2, and UART/BLE Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO37
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO37 is exposed on SOCKET1, SOCKET2, GROVE Connector, and OLED Display Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO38
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO38 is exposed on SOCKET1, SOCKET2, GROVE Connector, and OLED Display Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO29
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO29 is exposed on UART/BLE Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_GPIO27
Peripherals.Comment: GPIO27 is exposed on UART/BLE Connector.

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_ISU0_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU0 UART is exposed on SOCKET1, SOCKET2, and UART/BLE Connector. On SOCKET1/2: TX (TX), RX (RX) since RTS/CTS are not exposed, UART0 must be used with software flow control. On UART/BLE Connector: pin1 (CTS), pin2 (TX), pin3 (RX), pin4 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_ISU0_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: ISU0 SPI is exposed on UART/BLE Connector: pin 3 (MISO), pin 2 (SCLK), pin 1 (CSA), pin 4 (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_ISU0_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU0 I2C is exposed on UART/BLE Connector: pin 15 (SDA) and pin 10 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_ISU1_UART
Peripherals.Comment: ISU1 UART is exposed on SOCKET1: "MISO" (RX), "SCK" (TX), "CS" (CTS), and "MOSI" (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_ISU1_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: ISU1 SPI is shared between SOCKET1 and SOCKET2: MISO (MISO), SCK (SCLK), CS (CSA on SOCKET1 and CSB on SOCKET2), and MOSI (MOSI).

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_ISU1_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU2 I2C is shared between GROVE Connector, OLED DISPLAY Connector, SOCKET1 and SOCKET2. On GROVE Connector: pin 15 (SDA) and pin 10 (SCL). On OLED Display connector: pin 4 (SDA) and pin 3 (SCL).On SOCKET1/2: "MISO" (SDA) and "MOSI" (SCL)

Peripherals.Name: AVNET_MT3620_SK_ISU2_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: ISU2 I2C is shared between GROVE Connector, OLED DISPLAY Connector, SOCKET1 and SOCKET2. On GROVE Connector: pin 15 (SDA) and pin 10 (SCL). On OLED Display connector: pin 4 (SDA) and pin 3 (SCL).On SOCKET1/2: SDA (SDA) and SCL (SCL)
